name: RISING BIRD
description:
Just like falling, flying is part of ours lives. 

In this game you'll control a little bird who is to scared to fly, so instead, he'll jump branch to branch trying to get as far as possible from the ground.

Get ready to take flight with our little friend and maybe (who knows???) you'll find that falling is just a part of the process. 

HOW TO PLAY

All you have to do is make our little bird friend climb as high as you can go to, and avoid the fall. 

For that, you'll be using the keys:

A or left arrow <- to move the little bird to the LEFT

D or right arrow -> to move the little bird to the RIGHT

SPACEBAR to jump

BUT....

Pay close attention to the game rythm, because  some things that are visible when it's sunny might not be there when it gets dark.

Seems like a lot, but it's actually not.

And if you forget, that's ok!

We have a simple tutorial always waiting for you on the main menu that you can visit any time you want. 

 WHAT ABOUT THE TEAM???

Well my dear friend...

We're  small group of weird people from Goiânia, Brasil.

We like animals, chocolates and long walks on the beach ~~hot park beach of course~~ 

And yes, we're pretty too :) ~~pretty bad~~

 CURIOSITY
